layout.helpvalue:
How to get your API Key:

  1. Open PC Remote Wake web UI (http://localhost:3000)
  2. Login with your credentials
  3. Navigate to Settings or API Keys section
  4. Click 'Generate New API Key'
  5. Copy the key (starts with pcw_) - it's only shown once!

Device Discovery:

The plugin will automatically discover all devices registered in the PC Remote Wake web UI. No need to configure device IDs manually!
